home_list_description: We aim to build your aspirations.
about_list_description: Delighted to introduce ourselves to you.
services_list_description: We offer a diverse range of engineering services.
portfolio_list_description: Explore our portfolio and see our work.

recruitment_list_description: Submit your job application with us.
services_section_banner_description: With a high-level array of engineering services, Abak Company provides its esteemed clients with nothing but the best!
consulting_section_description: Connect with our experts and share your needs so we can find the best way to assist you. Abak Engineering Solutions turn your engineering challenges into a competitive advantage today!
consulting_feature_appointment_descripti: Fill out the information form choosing a convenient time for you.
consulting_feature_notification_descript: Our team will send you a meeting link after reviewing your request.
consulting_section_meeting_description: Get assistance from experts without leaving your home.
pricing_section_description: Abak provides its valued customers the opportunity to request pricing for any possible service they may need. All you have to do is click the service request button and fill out the information form. Once it reaches us, our team will work to determine the appropriate price, and you will receive a notification with the service cost.
portfolio_section_description: We invite you to browse Abak our portfolio, reflecting the company's efficiency and the level of trust placed in it.
features_section_multiple_description: We provide our dear clients with a range of safety and engineering services.
features_section_safety_description: We seek to integrate safety with engineering, with our safety services.
features_section_consulting_description: A service offered by Abak allows you to communicate directly with our experts.
features_section_successful_description: Abak - a leader in its field, a history full of achievements and broad trust.
contact_section_title: We are pleased to receive your inquiries
footer_about_company: A engineering consultancy office offering specialized engineering services and consultations, combining extensive experience and modern technology to meet the needs of our clients.
footer_hours_of_work_one: Sunday to Thursday: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM
footer_copy_rights: All rights reserved for Abak Engineering Consultancy Office.

email_validation: A valid email address is required.

consulting_service_description: As Abak Engineering Consultancy Office, we aim and strive to provide all means to facilitate easier transactions with our clients. We have provided a service for requesting quotations for our clients. You can inquire about the price of a service from the engineering services provided by our office by filling out the information form and specifying the type of service. You will receive a notification via email containing a quotation for the service you requested pricing for.

companey_address: .Malaz Dhahran Street, Riyadh - Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
about_description: Abak Engineering Consultancy Office is a Saudi establishment and a creative leap with a concept of the bright present and promising future, the strategic dimension in infrastructure and achieving safety with innovative advantages and a Saudi vision to achieve the highest international quality and safety standards. We at ABAK strive to achieve the highest international quality and safety standards through a team polished by experience and knowledge for decades, and to enhance the efficiency of our projects. We work on developing the level of service using innovative technologies and software to meet all the ambitions of our clients and turn the dream into reality.
recruitment_description: At Abak Engineering Consultancy Office, we aim and strive to provide all means to facilitate easier transactions with our clients. We have provided a service for requesting quotations for our clients. You can inquire about the price of a service from the engineering services provided by our office by filling out the information form and specifying the type of service. You will receive a notification via email containing a quotation for the service you requested pricing for.
prev_work_placeholder: Abak team would like to know about your experience and professional journey.
click_here_to_add_cv: Click here to upload your curriculum vitae (CV)
client_support_description: Welcome to Abak's customer support service, where we are delighted to provide exceptional and continuous support to our valued clients. We are here to meet your needs and assist you in solving any problems you encounter, around the clock and throughout the week. With pride and dedication, we offer you comprehensive technical support, including listening to your inquiries and assisting you in achieving your goals. We are here to ensure your complete comfort and satisfaction, so please feel free to contact us for any assistance or inquiry. We are always at your service and look forward to serving you with professionalism and quality.
panel_description: Our valued client, to your control panel. Through the control panel, you can view details related to all your orders, track the status of your order execution, and download the reports sent to you by the Abak team after requesting our engineering services.
our_dear_client_cong: our dear client! Your order has been successfully received.
cong_description: You can track the progress of your order and also view the reports and notes that the Abak team will send you during the execution of your order through the client control panel.
